data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
The first-half is now underway.
Celtic awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Celtic is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Celtic in their own half.
Throw-in for Celtic close to the penalty box.
William Collum signals a Celtic throw-in in Livingston's half.
Corner awarded to Celtic.
Can Celtic get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Livingston's half?
Celtic have a dangerous throw-in.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Celtic close to the penalty box.
Livingston are whistled for offside.
Celtic have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Celtic in the half of Livingston.
Odsonne Edouard has recovered and rejoins the match in Livingston.
Odsonne Edouard is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In Livingston a free kick has been awarded the away team.
William Collum awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Livingston at Tony Macaroni Arena.
Scott Robinson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Livingston.
Jon Guthrie for Livingston drives towards goal at Tony Macaroni Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Livingston have been awarded a corner by William Collum.
Callum McGregor puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Free kick for Livingston in their own half.
In Livingston, Scott Robinson of Livingston is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Livingston to take a throw-in in Celtic territory.
William Collum signals a free kick to Celtic in their own half.
Livingston drive upfield and Steven Lawless gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Celtic defender.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Livingston capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Celtic's half?
Jon Guthrie grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Tony Macaroni Arena.
Callum McGregor (Celtic) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Celtic have been awarded a corner by William Collum.
Important block from the Livingston defence as Callum McGregor fires in a strike for Celtic.
Corner awarded to Celtic.
Livingston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Celtic in their own half.
Throw-in for Livingston in the half of Celtic.
William Collum signals a free kick to Celtic in their own half.
Celtic's Odsonne Edouard breaks free at Tony Macaroni Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Livingston goal kick.
Livingston's Scott Robinson is whistled for offside at Tony Macaroni Arena.
Can Celtic capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
William Collum signals a free kick to Celtic.
Free kick in a good position for Celtic!
Efe Ambrose for Livingston has been booked by William Collum and receives a first yellow card.
Christopher Jullien (Celtic) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Livingston at Tony Macaroni Arena.
Livingston to take a throw-in in Celtic territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Celtic's Odsonne Edouard fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
William Collum awards Livingston a goal kick.
Free kick for Celtic in the half of Livingston.
William Collum signals a free kick to Livingston in their own half.
William Collum signals a Livingston throw-in in Celtic's half.
Can Celtic get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Livingston's half?
William Collum signals a Livingston throw-in in Celtic's half.
Livingston have been awarded a corner by William Collum.
Throw-in Celtic.
Throw-in for Livingston in the half of Celtic.
Livingston awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Celtic pushes forward through Greg Taylor, whose finish on goal is saved.
The first-half is over at Tony Macaroni Arena.
The second-half has started.
William Collum awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal! Scott Robinson gives Livingston a 2-1 lead.
Lyndon Dykes instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Livingston in their own half.
Free kick for Celtic in their own half.
Throw-in Celtic.
Celtic to take a throw-in in Livingston territory.
Ball safe as Livingston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Celtic awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Celtic at Tony Macaroni Arena.
Can Celtic get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Livingston's half?
In Livingston Livingston drive forward through Aaron Taylor-Sinclair. His shot is on target but it's saved.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Steven Lawless for Livingston who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Ciaron Brown for the home team is judged to be offside.
Livingston to take a throw-in in Celtic territory.
Celtic awarded a free kick in their own half.
Livingston's Steven Lawless is back in action after a slight knock.
Can Celtic get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Livingston's half?
James Forrest (Celtic) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
At Tony Macaroni Arena, Celtic are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in Celtic.
Celtic push forward at Tony Macaroni Arena and James Forrest gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Livingston defence.
Celtic's Nir Bitton gets in a shot on goal at Tony Macaroni Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
William Collum awards the home team a throw-in.
The away team replace Greg Taylor with Jeremie Frimpong.
Livingston needs to be cautious. Celtic have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Celtic in Livingston.
William Collum signals a throw-in for Celtic, close to Livingston's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Celtic in Livingston.
Marvin Bartley is on a sub for Scott Robinson for Livingston.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Celtic in the half of Livingston.
Ryan Christie (Celtic) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Celtic.
William Collum signals a throw-in for Celtic, close to Livingston's area.
William Collum signals a Celtic throw-in in Livingston's half.
The away team have replaced Mohamed Elyounoussi with Tom Rogic. This is the second substitution made today by Neil Lennon.
Steven Lawless (Livingston) has received a yellow card from William Collum.
Livingston are pushing forward but Lyndon Dykes's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Livingston.
Celtic drives forward and Odsonne Edouard gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Celtic.
Livingston make their second substitution with Robbie Crawford replacing Steven Lawless.
William Collum signals a free kick to Livingston in their own half.
Celtic to take a throw-in in Livingston territory.
Ball safe as Celtic is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Neil Lennon (Celtic) is making a third substitution, with Leigh Griffiths replacing Ryan Christie.
In Livingston Livingston attack through Lyndon Dykes. The finish is off target, however.
William Collum awards Celtic a goal kick.
Livingston awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Celtic in their own half.
Celtic have been awarded a corner by William Collum.
Celtic's Callum McGregor gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Livingston have a goal kick.
Celtic have been awarded a corner by William Collum.
Free kick for Livingston in their own half.
Free kick Celtic.
Celtic's Odsonne Edouard gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Livingston defender.
Odsonne Edouard (Celtic) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Livingston.
Corner awarded to Livingston.
William Collum signals a free kick to Celtic in their own half.
Livingston's Marvin Bartley has been booked in Livingston.
At Tony Macaroni Arena, Scott Brown has been yellow-carded for the away team.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Celtic at Tony Macaroni Arena.
Celtic awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Livingston in their own half.
Celtic awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Livingston is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Livingston goal kick.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Tom Rogic levels the match at 2-2.
Great play from Odsonne Edouard to set up the goal.
Aymen Souda is replacing Lyndon Dykes for the home team.
